verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:18
verses.text: And the judges shall make diligent inquisition: and, behold, if the witness be a false witness, and hath testified falsely against his brother;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:19
verses.text: Then shall ye do unto him, as he had thought to have done unto his brother: so shalt thou put the evil away from among you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:20
verses.text: And those which remain shall hear, and fear, and shall henceforth commit no more any such evil among you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:21
verses.text: And thine eye shall not pity; but life shall go for life, eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot.
